name: DanTheDad200
bio: Husband, father and gamer. New to the interwebz.
messages: Love  your page. Have watched the past ~100 streams with my granddaughter. I haveve really come around to your content.
I'm an old man, 71 this  year. Thank you for making content that is fun for everyone. Appreciate it, from Dan
appeal_message: Don't know  know how this thing works. Am I able to request review of this ban.
